 Adding to both sides of an inequality in ` _om ` (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2012.)
statement: nnawordi $p |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om /\ C e. _om ) -> ( A C_ B -> ( A +o C ) C_ ( B +o C ) ) ) $.
